color_swatches_setting_description.content: Adjust the view of swatches in Theme settings>Swatches

enable_product_darken_background.label: Darken image background
enable_product_darken_background.info: For product images with initially white or transparent background

product_badges_settings_header.info: Adjust the view and colors for badges in Theme settings>Product badges

product_badges_settings_description.content: Adjust the view and colors for badges. You can turn them on in the 'Badges' block on the product page or in Theme settings>Product cards

custom_badge_1_description.content: Create your own badges by linking them to [product tags](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/using-tags)

settings_description.content: We recommend that you use no more than two font families for your store. [Learn how fonts affect the store speed](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

image_picker.label: Favicon image
image_picker.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

cart_free_shipping_bar_threshold.label: Free shipping goal
cart_free_shipping_bar_threshold.info: Fill in the value in your store's main currency. Set up your [shipping rate](https://admin.shopify.com/settings/shipping) to match the goal.

primary_swatch_option_header.info: Show swatches in product cards, product pages, and filters

primary_option_name.label: Option name
primary_option_name.info: Fill in the relevant option name from your admin to turn on swatches

primary_custom_colors_and_patterns.label: Custom colors and patterns
primary_custom_colors_and_patterns.info: Place each rule in a separate line. [Learn how to add color swatches](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/theme-settings/color-swatches)

secondary_swatch_options_header.info: Show swatches for more than one option in product pages and filters

secondary_option_names.label: Option names
secondary_option_names.info: Fill in relevant option names from your admin, place each in a separate line

secondary_custom_colors_and_patterns.label: Custom colors and patterns
secondary_custom_colors_and_patterns.info: Place each rule in a separate line. [Learn how to add color swatches](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/theme-settings/color-swatches)

round_level.label: Edge rounding
round_level.info: Applies to cards, buttons, section corners, and other store components

product_media_filtering_option.label: Product media filtering option
product_media_filtering_option.info: Fill in the relevant option name from your admin. Its values will be used to filter and show product media only for the selected variant. [Learn more](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/tutorials/filter-media-by-variant)

settings.label: Note custom duties that you want applied
settings.info: Use two letter country code[Alpha-2 code](https://www.iban.com/country-codes)
settings.placeholder:
CH: up to 20$-40$ extra for duties?
AU: up to 70$ extra duties
settings.default:
CH: up to 20$-40$ extra for duties
AU: up to 45$ extra duties

popups.name: Popups
popups.description: Popups are a powerful tool that allows you to promote specific products, grow your mailing list and build relationships with your customers. Select the popup types that work best for your store. Learn about available [popup types.](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/popup-group/popups)

common.target_pages_description: Place each rule in a separate line. [Learn how to set up page targeting.](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/tutorials/popup-targeting-rules)
common.heading: Heading

image_position.label: Image position
image_position.info: Only top or back on mobile

product_tags.label: Product tags
product_tags.description: Fill in tags to show the popup only for the products with these tags. Separate each tag with a comma. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/using-tags)

exit_intent.label: Show on exit-intent
exit_intent.description: Tracks mouse movements and retains the visitors that are going to leave. Only for browsing on desktop.

common.overlay_color_info: Gradient has priority over solid colors
common.success_message_info: Appears after successful email submission. Not visible in the theme editor.

age_verify.name: Age verification
age_verify.exit_btn_url_info: The link to redirect customers when they don't agree to verify their age. Default link is "google.com"

cookie.name: Cookie banner
cookie.description: For correct popup operation, set up customer data collection to 'Collected after consent' or 'Partially collected before consent' in Customer privacy [online store preferences.](https://admin.shopify.com/?redirect=%2Fonline_store%2Fpreferences)
cookie.heading: Heading
